Reviews.Title: I love it... everything in bundle is high quality!!!
Reviews.Author: Raman
Reviews.Content: This budge has everything that we need for SLR camera also everything in bundle is high quality product!!!Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: outstanding bundle
Reviews.Author: karson killebrew
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with the high quality of everything in this bundle and at an outstanding price the best deal Anywhere....

Reviews.Title: what a great camera and a great deal! left me speechless!
Reviews.Author: Marta Sepulveda
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera! And what an amazing bundle deal! It got here super fast...I could not have asked for more!!! I'm soooooo happy with my new toy ;) I thought it was too good to be true ! But it was true!

Reviews.Title: Great bundle deal!  High quality products!
Reviews.Author: Zolotoi
Reviews.Content: This is a great package for anyone who's interested in taking the next step up from point-and-shoot cameras.  The camera itself takes great pictures and is easy to use.  All of the other items included in the bundle are of good quality and seem as though they'll stand the test of time without any problems.It's also worth mentioning that the items I received were among the best packed packages I've ever encountered.  Nothing was dented, torn, or broken.This is a great bundle deal that's hard to pass up.  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Rayz
Reviews.Content: Perfect picture every time .  I thought I found a problem so I called Canon support and they told me to put it on P  and make personal adjustments. This camera is a must have. this is my 3rd Canon so I bought the 4 year warranty because it is a expensive camera and it is covered.

ProductInfo.Features:
CAMETA CAMERA KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 64GB Ultimate SDXC UHS-1 Class 10 Memory Card +
<4> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <5> Spare LP-E12 Battery for Canon + <6> Precision Design 58mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filter Kit + <7> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Protector Filter +
<8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <9> Precision Design 2000 Digital SLR Gadget Bag with Shoulder Strap + <10> Precision Design Mini-HDMI/HDMI Cable for HDTV connection + <11> Precision Design Full-Size 58" Tripod with Case +
<12> Precision Design SDHC Memory Card Reader + <13> Precision Design 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> Precision Design Memory Card Wallet + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with EF 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Case + Flash + 3 UV/CPL/ND8 Filters Kit
